Params: {3: "After falling into Nat's trap, Karenina has been tumbling inside the vent for a few minutes..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Stops herself falling by wedging her weapon within the vent) ...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Goddamn Nat... What a dirty move... I'm not going to let her get away once I'm back with the commandant!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Watches through the fan) Down there... those are...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Abandoned Construct... Quantity: 121... Power supply damaged... Repair order A++... Order postponed...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Infected Construct... Danger... Danger... Assistance required immediately... immediately...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Nat's trying to fight them with infected Constructs...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Shakes her head) I was so foolish...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "They're clearing executing orders following a fixed blueprint.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '"Product," "batch"... this is a supply line Nat designed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "No wonder there are so many Constructs in Nat's army. They've been brought here like this from all over the world...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "(Looks down) In order to fill the ranks, you're even using infected Constructs... Have you thought about the risks, Nat?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'That is when Karenina realizes that in order to administer the golden antigen, the gold dust has to be transported into the building... through the vent...'}
{3: 'A large stream of gold dust crashes into Karenina, flushing her out of the vent into the group of guards and infected Constructs...'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Guard 15977-A0001... this is... your identity number... It is also...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '...I was hoping to avoid a fight.', 4: '1'}
